title: An unexpected error occurred while logging in.
body: I have never had a problem before today. When I tried to get on I enter password then get an error saying, "an unexpected error occurred when logging in.  I have tried many fixes including reinstalling.  I am using Mac OS sierra updated to most current version, if I use my ph New hotspot for internet I am able to log in for a moment but the connection is to slow to play a game. Does anyone have any tips for me?

replies.body:
i know how to fix this error. it works for me. 
go to https://www.hotspotshield.com/ and download it and it will fix this error.
Share this with to help more players!
i have exact same problem please inform me if you find a fix

I'm having the same problem, submitted a ticket but don't know if that'll help... :/
{{champion:32}}
I had the same issue today, reinstalled the game and it didn't work.  I power cycled my router and that worked.

Since that hotspot seems to work a little better, it leads me to think that your actual home network might be having a little problem getting a solid connection with our login servers, so it can't really let you through. It should be able to fix easy enough though, so let's be sure to check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) first. Let me know how that works for you!
I did everything in network settings and it still didn't work for me

There might be something entirely different happening on your end. Since those steps didn't seem to help go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where they'll be able to look much closer at what's going on!
